form.label: CIP-005 R1: Electronic Security Perimeter(s)
form.description: To manage electronic access to BES Cyber Systems by specifying a controlled Electronic Security Perimeter in support of protecting BES Cyber Systems against compromise that could lead to misoperation or instability in the BES.

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by _time,IDS_Attacks.signature,host,IDS_Attacks.src,IDS_Attacks.dest | `drop_dm_object_name("IDS_Attacks")` | `get_cip_info_by_hostname(host, "host")` | eval dest_zone=host_zone, site_id=host_site_id | `get_cip_asset_type(host_classification, cip_asset_type)` | search cip_asset_type="EACM" host_classification="*cip:*" (host_asset_type="*ids*" OR host_asset_type="ips") $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | `get_esp_zone(host_zone)` | rex field=signature "(?<chars_removal>(: \d+ chars)+)" | fillnull chars_removal value="" | eval signature=replace(signature, chars_removal, "") | stats sum(count) as total by signature
| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search classification="*cip:eap*" | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | dedup zone sortby zone | fields zone
| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | rename zone as dest_zone | search classification="*cip:eap*" $espZone_tok$ | dedup site_id sortby site_id | fields site_id

| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | rename zone as dest_zone | search $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | `get_cip_asset_type(classification, cip_asset_type)` | search classification="*cip:EAP*" cip_asset_type="EACM" | table nt_host,ip,vendor_product,asset_type,site_id,description,dest_zone | rename nt_host as Asset, vendor_product as Model, asset_type as "CIP Asset Type", ip as IP,site_id as Facility, description as Description, dest_zone as "ESP Zone"

html.h1: R1.1 - All applicable Cyber Assets connected to a network via a routable protocol shall reside within a defined ESP.

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.action="allowed" AND All_Traffic.src!=All_Traffic.dest AND [| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | eval All_Traffic.dvc=ip | fields All_Traffic.dvc ] by _time,All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.dvc,All_Traffic.dest | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dvc, "dvc")` | `get_cip_asset_type(dvc_classification, cip_asset_type)` | eval site_id=dvc_site_id, dest_zone=dvc_zone | search dvc_classification="*cip*" $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dest, "dest")` | `get_cip_info_by_ip(src, "src")` | `get_esp_zone(src_zone)` | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | `get_esp_zone(dvc_zone)` | where dvc_zone=src_zone AND dest_zone=src_zone AND src!=dest | `get_cip_type_and_icon(src_asset_type, type, src_asset_master_category)` | eval from=src_nt_host, to=dvc_nt_host | stats sum(count) as value by from,to,type,color | table from,to,value,type,color

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.action="allowed" AND [| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | eval All_Traffic.dvc=ip | fields All_Traffic.dvc ] by _time,All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.dvc,All_Traffic.dest | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dvc, "dvc")` | eval site_id=dvc_site_id, dest_zone=dvc_zone | search dvc_classification="*cip*" $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dest, "dest")` | `get_cip_info_by_ip(src, "src")` | fillnull src_zone value="esp:unknown" | `get_esp_zone(src_zone)` | fillnull dest_zone value="esp:unknown" | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | `get_esp_zone(dvc_zone)` | fillnull src_zone,dest_zone value="Unknown" | where (src_zone="Unknown" OR dest_zone="Unknown") OR (src_zone=dvc_zone AND src_zone=dest_zone) | eval Source=src_nt_host, Destination=dest_nt_host | stats sparkline(count) as Trend sum(count) as Total by Source,Destination | sort -Total | table Source,Destination,Total,Trend

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.action="allowed" OR All_Traffic.action="unknown" AND [| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | eval All_Traffic.dvc=ip | fields All_Traffic.dvc ] by _time,All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.dvc | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv ip as dvc OUTPUT classification, site_id,nt_host, zone as dest_zone, category | search classification="*cip:eap*" $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv ip as src OUTPUTNEW nt_host as Source, asset_type, zone as src_zone, classification as src_classification | eval Source=if(isnull(Source), src, Source) | `get_cip_type_and_icon(asset_type, type, asset_master_category)` | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | `get_esp_zone(src_zone)` | search asset_type!="firewall" | stats sum(count) as total by type,Source,dest_zone,color | rename Source as "from", dest_zone as "to" | eval value=from + " connections: " + total | table from, to, value, type, color

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.action="allowed" AND [| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | eval All_Traffic.dvc=ip | fields All_Traffic.dvc ] by _time,All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.dvc,All_Traffic.dest | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dvc, "dvc")` | eval site_id=dvc_site_id, dest_zone=dvc_zone | search dvc_classification="*cip*" $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dest, "dest")` | `get_cip_info_by_ip(src, "src")` | fillnull src_zone value="esp:unknown" | `get_esp_zone(src_zone)` | fillnull dest_zone value="esp:unknown" | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | `get_esp_zone(dvc_zone)` | fillnull src_zone,dest_zone value="Unknown" | where (src_zone="Unknown" OR dest_zone="Unknown") OR (src_zone=dvc_zone AND src_zone!=dest_zone) | eval Source=src_nt_host, Destination=dest_nt_host | stats sparkline(count) as Trend sum(count) as Total by Source,Destination | table Source,Destination,Total,Trend | sort -Total | head 20

| tstats `summariesonly` dc(IDS_Attacks.src) as src_count,dc(IDS_Attacks.dest) as dest_count,count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by IDS_Attacks.signature,host,IDS_Attacks.src,IDS_Attacks.dest | `drop_dm_object_name("IDS_Attacks")` | `get_cip_info_by_hostname(host, "host")` | eval dest_zone=host_zone, site_id=host_site_id | search host_classification="*cip*" (host_asset_type="*ids*" OR host_asset_type="ips") $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dest, "dest")` | `get_cip_info_by_ip(src, "src")` | `get_esp_zone(host_zone)` | search dest_classification="*cip*" | eval dest=if(isnull(dest_nt_host), dest, dest_nt_host) | eval src=if(isnull(src_nt_host), src, src_nt_host) | table host,signature,src,dest,count,host_zone, | sort - count | rename host as IDS, signature as Signature, src as Source, dest as Destination, count as "# Events", host_zone as "ESP Zone"

html.h1: R1.3 - Require inbound and outbound access permissions, including the reason for granting access, and deny all other access by default.

search.query: | inputlookup cip_firewall_rules.csv | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv ip as firewall OUTPUT ip,classification, site_id,nt_host, zone as dest_zone, priority, category | search classification="*cip:eap*" $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | makemv dest_zone delim="|" | mvexpand dest_zone | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | join type=left firewall src_object_group [| inputlookup cip_firewall_object_groups.csv | makemv delim="|" ips | eval src_object_group=group_name, src_ips=ips | fields firewall,src_object_group,src_ips] | join type=left firewall dest_object_group [| inputlookup cip_firewall_object_groups.csv | makemv delim="|" ips | eval dest_object_group=group_name, dest_ips=ips | fields firewall,dest_object_group,dest_ips] | join type=left firewall user_object_group [| inputlookup cip_firewall_object_groups.csv | makemv delim="|" ips | eval user_object_group=group_name, user_ips=ips | fields firewall,user_object_group,user_ips] | fillnull dest_ips,src_ips,user_ips value="any" | table nt_host,ip,dest_zone,firewall_rule,note,action,src_object_group,src_ips,dest_object_group,dest_ips,port,app,user_object_group,user_ips | rename nt_host as Host, ip as IP,dest_zone as "ESP Zone", firewall_rule as Rule,note as Description, action as Action, src_object_group as "Source Group", src_ips as "Source IP's", dest_object_group as "Dest Group", dest_ips as "Dest IPs", port as Port, user_object_group as "User Group", user_ips as "Users", app as App
